text: The 2018 ITF Women's Circuit is the 2018 edition of the second tier tour for women's professional tennis. It is organised by the International Tennis Federation and is a tier below the WTA Tour. The ITF Women's Circuit includes tournaments with prize money ranging from $15,000 up to $100,000. == Key == {|class=wikitable style=font-size:90%; |- align=center |
